generated_body: The article titled "Global debt surges above $250 trillion as US, China lead way" is likely to discuss the significant increase in global debt levels, highlighting the roles of major economies like the United States and China in this trend. Readers can expect an analysis of the factors contributing to this surge, such as economic policies and the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic. The article may also explore the potential implications of rising debt on global markets and economic stability, offering insights into how different countries are managing their fiscal responsibilities in this context.
